paste.name: Paste your data
paste.message: Copy and paste your data from other applications or websites. You can use tabular (TSV, CSV, DSV) or JSON data.

upload.name: Upload your data
upload.message: You can load tabular (TSV, CSV, DSV) or JSON data.

url.name: From URL
url.message: Enter a web address (URL) pointing to the data (e.g. a public Dropbox file, a public API, ...). Please, be sure the server is CORS-enabled.

wms.name: From WMS server
wms.message: Enter a web address (URL) from WMS server

barchart.description: It displays a categorical dimension and related amounts. Each bar represents a category, width is proportional to the quantitative dimension.

linechart.description: It displays a quantitative dimension over a continuous interval or time period. Colour can be optionally used to encode an additional quantitative or categorical dimension.

piechart.description: It allows you to see the proportions between values that make up a whole, by using arcs composing a circle.

scatterchart.description: The basic layout is a scatter plot, which allows to see correlations among two continuous dimensions.

treemapchart.description: It displays hierarchically structured data and a related quantitative dimension. It is composed of an area divided into small rectangles, representing the last level of the tree structure. The rectanglesâ€™ size depends on the quantitative dimension.

loadrows.succes: {{rowsnumber}} rows ({{cellsnumber}} cells) have been successfully parsed, now you can choose a chart!

screenSizeAlert.header: Welcome to Custom graphics development system!

body.header: Custom graphics development system is designed for bigger screens!

text.3: to come back at a better time.

body.footer: Touch devices are not fully supported yet.
